alert.note: Alert for Fairfield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 1:22PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Fairfield County through 145 PM EDT... At 122 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Monticello, or near VC Summer Nuclear Station, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winnsboro, VC Summer Nuclear Station, Fairfield County Airport, Monticello, Jenkinsville, Rion, Winnsboro Mills, Fairfield Elementary School, Lebanon Fire Station and Fairfield County Detention Center. This includes Interstate 77 near mile marker 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
